text: Akusikhona kwamuntu ukuthi uMvelinqangi anganika (umuntu) incwadi negunya kanye nobuphrofethi bese ethi lowomutu kubantu, “yibani yizikhonzi zami esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi” kodwa (okunalokho angathi), “yibani ngabantu abaqotho abafundile ngenkolo ngenxa yalokho ebenikufundisa okusencwadini futhi nangenxa yalokho enikufundile”
